Description: For sale is a 2013 Gibson Custom Shop Crimson Edition L-5 CT in a beautiful Faded Cherry finish with original case and COA. This instrument is in excellent condition and in perfect working order. There are some light scratches and a few tiny dings. Overall, I would give it a solid 9.5 out of 10 condition. Everything on the guitar is original. There are no cracks, repairs, or issues. The neck is straight with no issues. The original frets are in excellent condition with no wear. The original case has a little wear but works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.68" 1st Fret: 0.81" 9th Fret: 0.95" Neck Type: Medium "C" Shape Finger Board: Ebony Pickups: 57 Classic Weight: 7lb 14oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart.
